# IBookTours - Tour Booking Platform

## About
IBookTours is a premier tour booking platform specializing in Albania and the Balkans region. We offer day tours, multi-day vacation packages, and custom travel experiences.

## Services
- Day Tours: Half-day and full-day guided excursions
- Vacation Packages: Multi-day trips with accommodation and activities
- Custom Tours: Tailored travel experiences for groups
- Car Rental: Vehicle hire for self-guided exploration

## Destinations
- Albania: Tirana, Berat, Gjirokaster, Albanian Riviera, Albanian Alps
- Balkans: Kosovo, North Macedonia, Montenegro (coming soon)

## Key Features
- Secure online booking and payment
- Instant confirmation
- Free cancellation up to 24 hours before
- Multi-language support
- 24/7 customer support

## Contact
- Website: https://ibooktours.com
- Email: support@ibooktours.com
- Phone: Available on website

## API Access
For partnership or integration inquiries, contact partnerships@ibooktours.com
